Auditor's Office, Kentucky.
WILLIAM T. SAMUELS,
Attorney at Law & General Collecting Agent,
FRANKFORT, KY.
&#9758 Special attention given to collection of all claims confided to him throughout the State of Kentucky.
WILLIAM T. SAMUELS, Auditor.
EDGAR KENNON, Ass't Auditor.
James M. Withrow, Clerk.
Uberto Keenon, Clerk.
R. R. Bacon, Clerk.
John A Crittenden, Clerk.
Jno. W. Pruett, Jr., Clerk.
Charles T. Miller, Clerk.
John L. Sneed.Frankfort, Ky., April 27th, 1864.
Hon Tho. E. Bramlette
Gov. of Ky.
Dr Sir

Perry Wherritt, Clerk Harrison County Co. this day paid balance on Execution with Interest & Cost. for Revenue in his hand as Clerk from 3rd Novr. 1861 to 26th Septr. 1862. and now prays your Excellency to be releived from the payment of Fifty 22/100 Dollars, this being the amount adjudged against him as damages, for the nonpaymt. of said Revenue in time as required by law
